job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-18T22:18:56.000Z", "description": "Job Description

AWS DevOps Engineer / API Developer

Job Type: Direct-hire

Location: This role is US based remote or Chicago area only.

About: In this role, you would support our client' s AWS Environment in delivering our AWS Well-Architected Framework to support our customers\u2019 success. The bottom line at the top - we make the world a better place with the tools we build. Would you like to join us and help by building and deploying our AWS environment?

Let' s define \" Software Engineer\" as we see it. You love to and are great at:
  • Conducting Systems Operations on AWS
  • Coding in .NET / NodeJS / JavaScript and deploying to the AWS environment.
  • C++, Linux
  • Creating API platforms using REST and API Gateway, experience with different styles or flavors - a plus on API designs with microservices and Serverless environments
  • Agile Development Methodology
  • Unit testing, debugging, and documenting API or Source code.
  • And a good amount of the things in the \u201c What you bring to the team\u201d section below\u2026 so keep reading!
Now that you know what we\u2019 re looking for. Let\u2019 s speak about what you\u2019 re looking for. Do you...?
  • Want to contribute and have a voice at the company that just beat Google and Adobe for \u201c Best Emerging Technology\u201d at the 2021 Codie Awards?
  • Are you ready to build and manage an ENTIRE AWS INFRASTRUCTURE from code to our large deployment?
  • Desire to use your brilliant engineering skills to implement not just good products but products that do good?
  • Thrive in environments where accountability is prioritized and would love to own the output for a whole team?
  • See into the future to understand what structures we need to build now for our future to serve the future?
  • Want to work in an environment where you talk and problem solve with other teams?
  • Invest in tomorrow, today, by fixing tomorrow\u2019 s problems, yesterday?
  • Believe in the value of documentation - and kinda love it?
If you answered yes to those questions - this might be the role for you.

What You Bring To The Team
  • Years working as a hands-on developer
  • You might have had one of these titles in the past: AWS DevOps Engineer, API Developer
  • Use of AWS CloudFormation and AWS OpsWorks
  • Hands-on experience using both the AWS Management Console and the AWS Command Line Interface (AWS CLI)
  • .Net is a bonus!
  • Bring a good amount of the stuff listed in our definition of an Lead Software Engineer (above)
  • Anecdotally, we once had a developer turn down a role because they wanted to keep working in Azure and not work in AWS. If you\u2019 d turn down a role of work Azure to keep working in AWS - you might be a fit!
